questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of the product's packaging?
What color is the prominent band near the top of the package?
Judging by the visible contents, what appears to be the primary ingredient?

What is the general color of the majority of the visible product contents?
Describing the texture of the visible product, what word best fits?
Considering the visible portion of the product, what is its apparent consistency?
What single word best represents the style of the packaging design?
Based solely on visual inspection, what seems to be the packaging type?
Observing the visible portion, what is the apparent form of the product?
If you were to describe the visible surface of the packaging in one word, what would it be?
What is the most apparent visual feature of the product itself?
What is the apparent state of the product inside the packaging?
Ignoring any text, what single word best describes the visual impact of the packaging?
Considering the visual prominence of color on the packaging, what would you describe it as?
